title: [Glatoph, Glacier]
description: Ice crunches beneath your feet as you plod along the slope.  Mounds and hills of snow have been carved into eerie shapes by the ever present wind, bulges and hollows glistening.
Ice crunches beneath your feet as you plod along the slope.  Mounds and hills of snow have been carved into eerie shapes by the ever present wind, bulges and hollows glistening in the moonlight.
